src_original: tritayam api pavitrayantī jagat tuhinakarakarāvadātadyutiḥ /
tgt_original: bhavataḥ kīrtirmandākinī ca |  tuhinakarakaravadavadātā dyutiryasyāḥ sā tathā |  bhagavataśca kanakābhatvānmerūśikharasāmyam ||  vṛttapakṣe jagatyāṁ mandākinī ||  haratītyādi ||  harati nitāntamiyaṁ tava kīrtiḥ kṛtihṛdayāni dayānijavāsa |  prasavacayena citeva samantāddiśi diśi kundalatā dalatālam || 59 ||  yathā samantāddalatā vikasatā prasavacayena puṣpanivahena citā vyāptā kundalatā |

src_original: harati nitāntam iyaṃ tava kīrtiḥ kṛtihṛdayāni dayānijavāsa /
tgt_original: alamatyartham |  diśi diśi kṛtināṁ sukṛtināṁ hṛdayāni harati |  tathā he dayānivāsa |  iyamanantaroditā tava kīrtirdiśi diśi samantāt prasarantī paṇḍitahṛdayāni nitāntaṁ harati ||  vṛttapakṣe jagatyāṁ kundalatā nāmāpūrvam ||  dalayatyupāttaśobhāsamavāyo jagatāmaghāni ko 'pyeṣa kṛpābdhiḥ |

src_original: bahubuddhakoṭinirmāṇapaṭīyān dhṛtadharmadhātuvāgīśvaralīlaḥ // JVms_60 //
tgt_original: bahubuddhakoṭīnāṁ nirmāṇaṁ sfaraṇaṁ jananaṁ vā |  āryamañjuśriyo dehādanekabuddhakoṭīnāṁ sfaraṇāttavārādhanena ca prādurbhāvāttathābhidhānam ||  vṛttapakṣe dalamardha pādānāṁ tatra yatyā prāptaḥ san śobhāsamavāyo yena sa tathā |  jagatyāṁ vāgīśvaralīlo nāmāpūrvam ||  pravikiratītyādi ||

src_original: pravikiratīva viyattaraṅgiṇī-taralataraṅgaruco rucāṃ cayān /
tgt_original: pravikiratīva viyattaraṅgiṇītaralataraṅgarūcāṁ rūcāṁ cayān |  vilasati śaśvadasirdaśāntare tava yamunājalavīcimecakaḥ || 61 ||  tava daśāntare mūrtyantare 'rapacanādau śaśvadvilasati sati |  asistava yamunājalavīcivanmecakaḥ śyāmaḥ |  rūcāṁ cayān tavaiva kāyakiraṇanikarāṇāṁ kāntyā prakarṣeṇa vikiratīva cchurayatīva |

src_original: vilasati śaśvad asir daśāntare tava yamunājalavīcimecakaḥ // JVms_61 //
tgt_original: kīdṛśān |  viyattaraṅgiṇyāstaralataraṅgāṇāmiva rūk kāntiryeṣāṁ teṣāmapi viśadatvāt vicchinnavisāritvācca |  athavā tava daśāntare yathoktarūcāṁ cayān pravikirati sati |  tatraivoktaguṇo nistriṁśaḥ śaśvadvilasatīti yojanā ||  vṛttapakṣe jagatyāṁ yamunā nāma ||  mana ityādi ||

src_original: *manohārihārāvalīramyarūpaṃ kva nāthedṛśaṃ te surūpādhirāja /
tgt_original: manohārihārāvalīramyamīdṛk kka te nātha rūpaṁ surūpādhirāja |  kka taccātidurdāntasattvapraśāntyaisfuradbhīmabhūśābhujaṅgaprayātam || 62 ||  he nātha |  manohāriṇyā hārāvalyā ramyaṁ tava kkedṛśaṁ rūpam |  surūpādhirājetyanena rūpābhimānivinayanārtha tādṛṅ mahārājalīlādinirmāṇaṁ darśitamiti darśayati |  kka cātiśa yaṁ durdāntasattvānāṁ praśamarthaṁ sfurantaścalanto bhīmā bhayānakā bhūṣārthaṁ ye bhujaṅgāstaiḥ prayātamāśritaṁ yamāryādirūpam |

src_original: aviralamauktikaprakarabhūṣā harati na kasya cittam iyam īśa /
tgt_original: he īśa |  suṣṭhu rūcirā mallikāyāḥ samaye yauvanadaśāyāṁ sevyā pratinavā abhinavā yā mālā yad vā surūcirā mallikā kāle sevyā yā pratinavā mālā mallikāyā eva sā yasyā asti mūrteḥ |  saiva taveyaṁ mūrtiḥ kasya na cittaṁ harati |  sarvasyaiva haratītyarthaḥ |  kiṁbhūtā |

src_original: suruciramallikāsamayasevya-pratinavamālinīva tava mūrtiḥ // JVms_63 //
tgt_original: aviralena mauktikaprakareṇa |  sa eva vā bhūśā yasyāḥ sā ||  vṛttapakṣe jagatyāṁ navamālinī ||  tavetyādi ||  tava nātha paraṁ yadi kāntisudhājaladhau śramamujzhati zhātkṛtini |  śubharūpanirūpaṇalampaṭakaṁ parito 'ṭakamaṅga jagannayanam || 64 ||

src_original: tava nātha paraṃ yadi kāntisudhā-jaladhau śramam ujjhati jhātkṛtini /
tgt_original: aṅgaśabdaḥ saṁbuddhau |  he nātha |  jagannayanaṁ tava kāntireva sudhājaladhistarimañzhātkṛtini śramamāyāsaṁ paramujzhati |  nānyatra |  samudro'pi hi velāparaṁparayā zhātkāravān |  bhagavānapyanavaratanityalāvaṇyalaharībhiḥ |

src_original: śubharūpanirūpaṇalampaṭakaṃ parito 'ṭakam aṅga jagannayanam // JVms_64 //
tgt_original: kiṁbhūtaṁ jagannayanam |  śubhaṁ manoharaṁ rūpaṁ tasya nirūpaṇe lampaṭakaṁ sat paritaḥ samantādaṭatītyarthaḥ |  tadevāṭakam |  ata evāsya śramaḥ |  anyo'pi hi cirabhramaṇapariśrāntaḥ samudrādimahājalāśaye śramamapanayati ||

src_original: varada viratibhāñji vyaktam aṅgāny atibhava bhavitā no 'vaśyam eva /
tgt_original: varadetyādi ||  varada viratibhāñji vyaktamaṅgānyatibhava bhavitā no'vaśyameva |  tava vacanasudhāyāḥ pānapātraṁ śravaṇayugapuṭo 'yaṁ prītihetuḥ || 65 ||  he varada |  atibhava bhavamatikrānta |  no 'smākamaṅgāni hastapādādīni |  vyaktaṁ viratimanabhiratiṁ bhajante |  sukhahetavo na bhavantītyarthaḥ |

src_original: tava vacanasudhāyāḥ pānapātraṃ śravaṇayugapuṭo 'yaṃ prītihetuḥ // JVms_65 //
tgt_original: śravaṇayoryugaṁ tasya puṭaḥ |  sa punaravaśyameva naḥ prītiheturbhaviṣyati |  katham |  tava vacanasudhāyāḥ pānapātraṁ yasmāt ||  vṛttapakṣe jagatyāṁ puṭo nāma |

src_original: vṛṇe varam imaṃ tvad ekam atula-prabhāva bhavatān na mādṛśajanaḥ /
tgt_original: vṛṇe varamimaṁ tvadekamatulaprabhāva bhavatānna mādṛśajanaḥ |

src_original: bhavantam api yah śrayañ chamasudhā-raseṣu viratir jaḍoddhatagatiḥ // JVms_66 //
tgt_original: bhavantamapi yaḥ śrayañchamasudhāraseṣu viratirjaḍoddhatagatiḥ || 66 ||  he atulaprabhāva |  tvattvattaḥ sakāśādekaṁ varaṁ vṛṇe yāce |

src_original: tvatprasādasamudīrṇaśubhavaśād aṣṭabhedi sukham eva kṛtijanaḥ /
tgt_original: kaṁ varaṁ yācasītyāha |  mādṛśo jano na kaścid bhavatānnotpadyatām |  kīdṛśaḥ |  yo bhavantamapi vāgīśvaraṁ śrayañjaḍā mandā uddhatā vikṣiptā gatirmatiryasya sa tathābhūtaḥ san |  vigatā ratirabhilāṣo yasya tathā bhavati |

src_original: locanotsavavidhāsu tanubhṛtāṃ candra vartma samupaiti bhavabhidām // JVms_67 //
tgt_original: kasmin viṣaye |  śamāḥ śāntayastā eva sudhārasāsteṣu |  vṛttapakṣe jagatyāṁ jaloddhatagatirnāma |  tatra ca raseṣu ṣaṭsu viratiḥ ||  tvadityādi ||  tvatprasādasamudīrṇaśubhavaśādaṣṭabhedi sukhameva kṛtijanaḥ |  locanotsavavidhāsu tanubhṛtāṁ candra vartma samupaiti bhavabhidām || 67 ||  he tanubhṛtāṁ locanotsavavidhāsu nayanānandakṛtiṣu candra |

src_original: kas tvayi baddhavarmaṇi jagaddhitadhānadhiyā nirvihatapratijña paritāpakaṇaḥ kva cana /
tgt_original: kastvayi baddhavarmaṇi jagaddhitadhānadhiyā nirvihatapratijña paritāpakaṇaḥ kka cana |  māravadhūjanasya kamanīyakapolatale yannavapattrabhaṅgaracanālasa eva karaḥ || 92 ||  jagaddhitasya dhānamādhānam taddhitadhānadhiyā baddhavarmaṇi baddhavīryasaṁnāhe tvayi kka cana parārthaviṣaye paritāpasya kaṇo lavo'pi |  tasya mama hitatvāt |  ata eva nirvihatapratijñetyāmantraṇam |  nirniṣedhe'tra |

src_original: māravadhūjanasya kamanīyakapolatale yan navapattrabhaṅgaracanālasa eva karaḥ // JVms_92 //
tgt_original: yad yasmānmāravadhūjanasya kamanīyakapolatale navā yā pattrabhaṅgaracanā tatrālasa eva karo vartate mārasya jitatvāt ||  vṛttapakṣe 'ṣṭau pattra bhaṅgaracanā nāmāpūrvam ||  nirūpametyādi ||  nirūpamaramyarūpa jinajātadṛśvano 'ṣṭau madayati te'dhikaṁ vidhutaśoka lokapālān |  sadupadhipuṇḍarīkanakharājirājiteyaṁ viracitapañcacīrarūcirā kumāralīlā || 93 ||

src_original: nirupamaramyarūpa jinajātadṛśvano 'ṣṭau madayati te 'dhikaṃ vidhutaśoka lokapālān /
tgt_original: he nirūpamaramyarūpa |  vidhutaśoka |  te tava jinajātadṛśvanaḥ sugatasamūhaṁ dṛṣṭavata iyaṁ kumārī līlāṣṭau lokapālānmadayati harṣayati |  adhikamatyartham |  jinajāta dṛśvano'pi kumāralī leyamatirūciretyatyarthamadahetuḥ |

src_original: sadupadhipuṇḍarīkanakharājirājiteyaṃ viracitapañcacīrarucirā kumāralīlā // JVms_93 //
tgt_original: kīdṛśī |  viracitapañcacīratvena rūcirā |  punaḥ kiṁbhūtā |  san śobhana upadhirūpādhiriha svarṇa yasyāḥ |  vṛttapakṣe 'ṣṭau kumāralīlā nāma |

src_original: guṇānām atyaṣṭiḥ katham iha mamevāstu jagatām iti cchandaḥ svairaṃ pariṇatim avāpat tava tathā /
tgt_original: aṣṭāvitīta ūrdhvaṁ nādhikriyate ||  guṇānāmityādi ||  guṇānāmatyaṣṭiḥ kathamiha mamevāstu jagatāmiti cchandaḥ svairaṁ pariṇatimavāpattava tathā |  yathā tvayyevāsmin paramarasabhedapraṇayanī samudbhūtā bhūtirnikhilasukhaśākhāśikhariṇī || 94 ||  iha jagati |  mama yā guṇānāma tyaṣṭirativyāptiḥ |

src_original: yathā tvayy evāsmin paramarasabhedapraṇayanī samudbhūtā bhūtir nikhilasukhaśākhāśikhariṇī // JVms_94 //
tgt_original: saiva jagatāmāśiṣe kathamastviti |  cchando 'bhilāṣastava svairaṁ śanaiḥ pariṇatiṁ paripākaṁ tathāvāpat agamat yathāsmin jagati nikhilānāṁ sukhānāṁ śākhā pāramitā tasyāḥ śikharaṁ paryantastadvatī guṇānāṁ vibhūtiḥ tvayyeva bhagavati samudbhūtā |  parārthaparatvena svārthasaṁpadviśeṣāvāhakatvāt praṇidhiprasthānayordvayoḥ |  kiṁbhūtā |  paramasya rasabhedasya śṛṅgārādirasaviśeṣasya praṇayanī ||

src_original: jayaty amaramandiropalaviśālarakṣaḥsthalaḥ sthalīkamalakānanapratimapādakandaprabhaḥ /  prabhākaraśatādhikaprakaṭatejasālaṅkṛtaḥ kṛtāntamadamardanas tribhavanāthapṛthvīdharaḥ // JVms_95 //
tgt_original: vṛttapakṣe 'tyaṣṭiḥ saptadaśākṣaraṁ cchandastathā pariṇatimavāpadyathā śikhariṇī samudbhūtā |  sā ca rasāḥ ṣaṭ tatra prabhedo bhaṅgastatpraṇayanī |  atyaṣṭicchandastathā pariṇatimavāpadyathā samudbhūteti mandākrāntāparyantamadhikṛtaṁ veditavyam |  jayatītyādi ||  jayatyamaramandiropalaviśālavakṣaḥ sthalaḥ sthalīkamalakānanapratimapādakandaprabhaḥ |

src_original: tīvratāpavidrutāyasacchaṭāsadṛkkaṭākṣasaṃyamakṣaṇā-dhīnaviśvasaṃcayaiś caturdigīśvaraiḥ prakṛtyudañcitātmabhiḥ /
tgt_original: tīvratāpavidrutāyasacchaṭāsadṛkkaṭākṣasaṁyamakṣaṇādhīnaviśvasaṁcayaiścaturdigīśvaraiḥ prakṛtyudañcitātmabhiḥ |  sfāravibhramaprapañcapañcapañcabāṇajiṣṇubhirdaśātmanā sundarījanena cātanoṣi kāmapi prakāmavismayāṁ śriyam || 110 ||  tīvratāpena vidrutā yā āyasī āyasasya vā chaṭā tatsadṛśānāṁ kaṭākṣāṇāṁ saṁyamakṣaṇe 'dhīno viśvasya saṁcayaḥ sṛṣṭiryeṣāṁ taiścatasṛṇāṁ diśāmīśvarairyamāntakādibhiścaturbhiḥ krodhaiḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ kāmapi prakāmavismayāṁ śriyamātanoṣi |  kiṁbhūtaiḥ |  prakṛtyaiva udañcito mahattvenotthāpita ātmā taiḥ tathā |  sfāro vibhramasya bhrāntervilāsasya vā prapañco vaicitryaṁ tasya pañcanaṁ pañco vistāraṇaṁ yasya |  sa cāsau pañcabāṇaśca tasya jiṣṇubhiḥ |

src_original: utkīrṇonnidrakundaprakaram iva dṛśāṃ cārubhaṅgais tribhāgaiḥ svedasrastāṅgarāgasnapitam iva muhuḥ kāntakānticchaṭābhiḥ /
tgt_original: utkīrṇonnidrakundaprakaramiva dṛśāṁ cārūbhaṅgaistribhāgaiḥ svedasrastāṅgarāgasnapitamiva muhuḥ kāntakānticchaṭābhiḥ |  vyāptaṁ vyoma tvadarcārūcibhirabhihatāvidya vidyādharībhiḥ saurabhyākṛṣṭahṛṣṭakkaṇadalipaṭalollāsitasragdharābhiḥ || 111 ||  srajāmeva saurabhyeṇākṛṣṭaṁ paścādiṣṭārthalābhāddhṛṣṭamata eva kkaṇat yadalipaṭalaṁ tenollāsitāḥ srajaḥ pūjārthaṁ dharantīti tābhiḥ |  tvadarcārūcibhirvidyādharībhirvyoma vyāptaṁ sat utkīrṇa upta ūrdhva kṣipto vā unnirāṇāṁ kundānāṁ prakaro yatra tadivābhātīti gamyam |  tāsāmeva dṛśāṁ tribhāgaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ sfuraṇa dṛśaiḥ cārūrbhaṅgo valanaṁ yeṣāṁ taiḥ |

src_original: vyāptaṃ vyoma tvadarcārucibhir abhihatāvidya vidyādharībhiḥ saurabhyākṛṣṭahṛṣṭakvaṇadalipaṭalollāsitasragdharābhiḥ // JVms_111 //
tgt_original: tathā tābhireva vidyādharībhiḥ kāntakānticchaṭābhirvyoma vyāptam |  bhagavaddarśanajanitasāttvikasvedavaśāt srastenāṅgarāgeṇa vilepanena snapitaṁ mṛṣitamivābhāti ||  vṛttapakṣe prakṛtyudañcitā sragdharā |  sā ca cārūrbhaṅgo yatiryeṣāṁ taistribhiḥ bhāgaiḥ pratyekaṁ saptakākṣarairlakṣitā |  prakṛtyudañciteti nivṛttam ||

src_original: ākṛtijanmavṛttavibhavakramātiśayasaṃpadaḥ sukham iyād īśa digantagītam amalaṃ yaśaś ca śaradindusundarataram /
tgt_original: ākṛtītyādi ||  ākṛtijanmavṛttavibhavakramātiśayasaṁpadaḥ sukhamiyādīśa digantagītamamalaṁ yaśaśca śaradindusundarataram |  gāyati yastvadāhvayamayaṁ sadaiva bhagavanbhavādhvagajano nūnamagamyagaurava girāṁ guro guṇasamudra madrakamidam || 112 ||  he bhagavan īśa |  girāmagamyagaurava guro guṇasamudra |  yo bhavādhvagajana idaṁ tvadāhvayamayaṁ tvannāmagarbhaṁ madrakaṁ rāgaviśeṣaṁ sadaiva gāyati saḥ |  ākṛtiśca rūpam |

src_original: madhvāsārasnātodbhrāntaprabalamadamukkharamadhukaranikaraṃ prīter ekaṃ līlāvāsaṃ viditabalam api munihṛdayavikṛtaḥ /
tgt_original: digante gītaṁ śaradindusundarataratvādevāmalaṁ yaśaśceyāt ||  vṛttapakṣe ākṛtau dvāviṁśatyakṣare cchandasi janma yasya tanmadrakamidaṁ vṛttam |  tacca dikṣu daśasu anto virāmastena gītam |  ākṛtijanmeti nivṛttam ||  madhvāsāretyādi ||  madhvāsārasnātodbhrāntaprabalamadamukharamadhukaranikaraṁ prīterekaṁ līlāvāsaṁ viditabalamapi munihṛdayavikṛtau |  vāgīśāna tvayyekāntaṁ vasuviṣayaviratisamupacitabalīḥ saṁbhogaśrīmattākrīḍaṁ varada divi niyatamanubhavati || 113 ||

src_original: vāgīśāna tvayy ekāntaṃ vasuviṣayaviratisamupacitabaliḥ saṃbhogaśrīmattākrīḍaṃ varada divi niyatam anubhavati // JVms_113 //
tgt_original: he vāgīśāna |  varada |  tvayi ekāntaṁ vasuviṣaye vigatā ratiryatra samupacayane tadyathā bhavati vasuviṣaye vādṛṣṭatayā samupacito baliḥ upahāro yena sa sudhīḥ |  saṁbhogaśrīmattayā krīḍanaṁ krīḍaṁ divi niyatamanubhavati |  kiṁbhūtam |  madhunaḥ sudhāyā āsāreṇa snātastadanu upari bhrāntaḥ prabalamadena mukharo madhukarāṇāṁ nikaro yasmin |  prīteśca ekamasādhāraṇaṁ līlāvāsam |  pravararathādhirūdasubhaṭaṁ balaṁ balanidhe tvadekaśaraṇaṁ śrayati naraṁ manoharayatipraveśavaśagottamāśvalalitam || 114 ||  he balānāṁ sthānāsthānajñānabalādīnāṁ daśānāṁ nidhe |  tvadekaśaraṇaṁ naraṁ balaṁ caturaṅgaṁ śrayati |  kīdṛśam |

src_original: madagurugaṇḍagarjitajitonnatāmbudagajendravṛndamalinaṃ niśitasamastaśastrakiraṇaprabhāmbarapinaddhapattinivaham /  pravararathādhirūḍhasubhaṭaṃ balaṃ balanidhe tvadekaśaraṇaṃ śrayati naraṃ manoharayatipraveśavaśagottamāśvalalitam // JVms_114 //
tgt_original: madena gurūgaṇḍānāṁ garjitena jitonnatāmbudānāṁ gajānāṁ vṛndena malinam |  kkacit prabhāsvareti pāṭhaḥ |  tatra kiraṇaiḥ prabhāsvarādeva pinaddhaḥ pattinivaho yasmin tattathā |  pravararathādhirūdasubhaṭaṁ ca |  manoharā ucitānatikramā ca yati paramo yeṣām |  tathā prakṛṣṭo veśo yeṣāmata eva te suśikṣitatvādvāhakavaśagā uttamāḥ |  vṛttapakṣe harā ekādaśa |

src_original: prītinivāsaṃ kṛtibhuvi viditodāravarapradavarivasanaṃ tvāṃ yaḥ smaratīśa pratihatavimatiḥ saṃtatam antimapadam uditeṣu /  yauvanalīlāsacivasamudayatpañcamakasvarayatiramaṇīyā syād iha tanvī himakaravadanā tadvaśagā saha narapatilakṣmyā // JVms_115 //
tgt_original: vikṛtāviti nivṛttam || 23 ||  prītītyādi ||  prītinivāsaṁ kṛtibhuvi viditodāravarapradavarivasanaṁ tvāṁ yāḥsmaratīśa pratihatavimatiḥ saṁtatamantimapadamuditeṣu |  yauvanalīlāsacivasamudayatpañcamakasvarayatiramaṇīyā syādiha tanvī himakaravadanā tadvaśagā saha narapatilakṣmyā || 115 ||

src_original: guṇasāgara sāgarair apūritāṅgurīgarto viṣamaṃ daśāntare dayā padacaturūrdhvaṃ nayati bhāvam // JVms_141 //  iti nigaditajātau kṛtaviṣamacaraṇaracanāyām /
tgt_original: praśamitasakalakaṭukaluṣaviṣarāśiriyameva tava nayanavalanalavalīlā |  mṛdujanaṁ punarlakṣyī kṛtya niyatamamṛtasya dhāreva |

src_original: pratimuhur abhinavam atulasukhanidhim upanayantī niyatam amṛtadhāra // JVms_145 //
tgt_original: pratimuhuḥ punarabhinavamatulaṁ sukhasya nidhimāśrayamupanayantī |

src_original: padacaturūrdhvaprabhedāḥ // //
tgt_original: yathā vineyāśayaṁ karūṇayā nirmāṇavaicitryāt ||  vṛttapakṣe āpīḍaprathamapādasyaiva caturthatve 'mṛta dhārā || ||  padacaturūrdhvaprabhedāḥ ||  taḍityādi ||  taḍitojjvalaṁ jaladarāśimaniśamudabhārabandhuram |  ghoraghanarasitamīśa tanuḥ kṛpayā kuto'pi jayatīyamugatā || 146 ||  he īśa iyaṁ tavānantaroditarūpā tanuḥ kṛpayā kayāpyanirvacanīyayā niśamudgatā jaladarāśiṁ jayati |  kīdṛśam |  ujjvalaṁ taḍitā |

src_original: taḍitojjvalaṃ jaladarāśim aniśam udabhārabandhuram /
tgt_original: tathā udakasya bhāro rāśiḥ |  bhāre udakasyodabhāvaḥ |  tena bandhuraṁ namram |

src_original: ata eva duṣkaratarāṇi vilasitaśatāni tanvataḥ /
tgt_original: ata eva duṣkaratarāṇi vilasitaśatāni tanvataḥ |

src_original: hlādayaty akhilalokam idaṃ paṭukīrtisaurabhakam adbhutaṃ tava // JVms_147 //
tgt_original: hlādayatyakhilalokamidaṁ paṭukīrtisaurabhakamabhutaṁ tava || 147 ||

src_original: damayati tava bhuvanāni vapur lalitaṃ ca kiṃ tu vikaṭaṃ yad īdṛśam // JVms_148 //  // udgatābhedāḥ // //
tgt_original: iti ca māghaḥ ||  vṛttapakṣe udgatāyā eva tṛtīyapādasyānyathātve yathādarśite saurabhakam ||

src_original: prāgbhārātiśaye 'pi tādṛśe 'dbhutabhīme bhuvanāhitahataye samaṃ samantāt /
tgt_original: bhṛkuṭītyādi ||  bhṛkuṭīkaṭākṣadaśaneṣu kimapi vikṛtāni bibhrataḥ |  damayati tava bhuvanāni vapurlalitaṁ ca kiṁ tu vikaṭaṁ yadīdṛśam || 148 ||  lalitaṁ ca manoharamapi tava vapurbhuvanāni damayati |  kiṁ tu bhṛkuṭīkaṭākṣeṇa yukteṣu daśaneṣu vikṛtāni |  kimapīti kriyāviśeṣaṇam |

src_original: kiṃ bhūyo bhagavan bhavantam aśrayam āptaḥ sthitabhāram atulam ārṣabhaṃ dadhānam /
tgt_original: kiṁ bhūyo bhagavanbhavantamāśrayamāptaḥ sthirabhāra matulamārṣabhaṁ dadhānam |

src_original: tac chuddhavirāḍviśeṣaṇam hy aparaviṣamaśirasi padaṃ vinidhatte // JVms_150 //
tgt_original: tacchuddhavirāḍviśeṣaṇaṁ hyaparaviṣamaśirasi padaṁ vinidhatte || 150 ||

src_original: ārādhyeti bhavantam āśrayaikasamṛddhyā kuśalaṃ yad amalam asti vardhamānam /  tat idam akhilam udañcatu bhuvanam urupadaṃ tvadabhimatam ativividhavṛttaviśeṣaiḥ // JVms_151 //
tgt_original: ārādhyeti bhavantamāśayaikasamṛvdyā kuśalaṁ yadamalamasti vardhamānam |  tadidamakhilamudañcatu bhuvanamurūpadaṁ tvadabhimatamativividhavṛttaviśeṣaiḥ || 151 ||

src_original: api ca pracayena bhūyasā kuśalasyāsya nikamanirmalasya /
tgt_original: api ca pracayena bhūyasā kuśalasyāsya nikāmanirmalasya |

src_original: vigalatu sakalasya dehino bhavarajanīprabhavāndhakārarāśiḥ // JVms_152 //
tgt_original: vigalatu sakalasya dehino bhavarajanīprabhavāndhakārarāśiḥ || 152 || ||

src_original: // sarvaviṣamāṇi //
tgt_original: sarvaviṣamāṇi ||

src_original: kiṃ ca prauḍhaprajñāpreyasy-aliṅgenānaṅgakrīḍam /
tgt_original: kiṁ ca praudaprajñāpreyasyāliṅgenānaṅgakrīḍam |

src_original: uḍupatiruciranicayamayam iva vapur anatiśayakaruṇam iha vahad anubhavatu // JVms_153 //
tgt_original: uḍupatirūciranicayamayamivavapuranatiśayakarūṇamiha vahadanubhavatu || 153 || ||  ardhaviṣamam ||

src_original: vicitravṛttair iti varṇanena yad ācitaṃ candrakarāmalaṃ śubham /
tgt_original: vicitravṛttairitivarṇanena yadācitaṁ candrakarāmalaṁ śubham |

src_original: tato 'stu lokaḥ parimuktaśokaḥ sphuranmahāsaukhyaśikhāsakhīvaraḥ // JVms_154 //
tgt_original: tato'stu lokaḥ parimuktaśokaḥ sfuranmahāsaukhyaśikhāsakhīvaraḥ || 154 || ||

src_original: // pādaviṣamam //  // āryamañjughoṣasya duṣkaraprabhedā Vṛttamālāstutiḥ samāpta //
tgt_original: pādaviṣamam || ||  āryamañjughoṣasya duṣkaraprabhedā vṛttamālāstutiḥ samāptā || ||

src_original: // kṛtir iyaṃ mahāpaṇḍitasthaviraJñānaśrīmitrasya //
tgt_original: kṛtiriyaṁ mahāpaṇḍitasthavirajñānaśrīmitrasya | | |
